page.title: 13FARMS 2
page.content:
{FARMS IN WINESTEAD}
{FIR TREE FARM:}There are 5 people employed on this 250 acre farm. There are 4 tractors, 2 ploughs, drags, rotovators, drills, fertiliser spinner and sprayer and combine harvester. {WILLOW HOUSE FARM:}In addition to the implements listed above on this 280 acre site, they have a straw chopper because of the general uproar by the public against stubble burning, which although not as yet banned carries a Â£2000 fine if it gets out of control. Two men are employed. {MANOR FARM:}Three men are employed on the 700 acre farm, having the same implements as above but having 10 tractors. A large grain dryer stands in the yard. A communication set links the house with the combine, tractor and pick-up truck.
